title: Nation salutes ASI Buriro, his daughter: Senator Shibli
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 14 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting, Senator Shibli Faraz, on Saturday said the nation saluted Assistant Sub-Inspector Muhammad Bux Buriro and his daughter for their sense of responsibility.
In a tweet, he said Buriro was a proud father who did not hesitate while performing his duty and with the help of his daughter and rescued a minor girl.
اے ایس آئی محمد بخش بریرو اور ان کی صاحبزادی کو قوم کا سلام۔ بریرو وہ قابل فخر والد ہیں جنہوں نے فرض کی ادائیگی میں اپنی صاحبزادی کی قربانی سے بھی دریغ نہ کیا۔ آپ پوری پولیس فورس کی شان ہیں۔آپ کا طرزِ عمل معاشرے کے لئے روشن پیغام اور امید کی کرن ہے۔
— Senator Shibli Faraz (@shiblifaraz) November 14, 2020
Buriro was the pride of the police force and his behaviour was a bright message and a ray of hope for the society, he said.
